READMEæ¨¡ç‰ˆ #  æ¨¡ç‰ˆé¢„è§ˆ  # Method name  [Paper](link) | [Pretrained Model](link) **Title (CVPR 2021)** Author1, Author2, Author3 ## News [optional]  ## Introduction  paperçš„abstract ## Highlights  + åˆ›æ–°ç‚¹1 + åˆ›æ–°ç‚¹2 + åˆ›æ–°ç‚¹3 ## Network Architecture  é™„å›¾ ## Result  é™„å›¾ ## Requirement  - Pytorch >= 1.8 - OpenCV - ...... ## Getting Started  ï¼ˆå¯å‚è€ƒä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼‰ 1. **Install the requirments** ```shell conda install -c conda-forge opencv conda install pytorch torchvision torchaudio cudatoolkit=11.3 -c pytorch pip install -r requirements.txt ``` 2. **Clone the repo** ```shell git clone https://github.com/Zeqiang-Lai/DPHSIR.git cd DPHSIR pip install -e . ``` 3. **Run cli or playgrounds** - Download the [sample input](https://1drv.ms/u/s!AomvdxwcLmYImEc-Yfj2B2FBGEb0?e=vShXe9) if you don't have one. ```shell # run cli python cli/main.py -i [input_path] [task] # run playground python playgrounds/deblur.py ``` ## Citation  If you find this work useful for your research, please cite: ```bibtex Bibtex ``` ## Acknowledgement [optional]
